contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of October, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED limited to the issue of whether there was sufficient evidence to support petitioner’s conviction for contempt of court. This matter is to be consolidated for purposes of oral argument with Behr v. Tereshko & Franklin, No. 51 E.D. Appeal Docket 1996.
